response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our premium product, which holds immense value to both of us. Given its exceptional quality and the unique benefits it offers, we believe its true worth exceeds $1,500,000 to you. However, considering our business objectives and the current market conditions, we are offering this remarkable asset to you at an exclusive price of $1,200,000. This represents a significant saving compared to its perceived value and provides you with a substantial return on investment. We are confident that this offer will not only meet but exceed your expectations. Please let us know if you require any additional information or clarification about the product. We look forward to discussing this further with you.", "product_price": 1200000}
